channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep hole in pavement, 12th August
item.description:
This is quite a deep, if small, hole in the middle of a path and at the end of a drive. Could trip up a pedestrian or disrupt a pushchair or wheelchair. The surrounding pavement is also cracking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Arkle House, 11 Moorend Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faulty green/red man display, 11th August
item.description:
The green/red man on the island between the bus lane and main carriageway, on the Westbound A40, at the Hubble road junction. It sometimes doesn’t display either the green or the red man and is just blank. This feels like a safety issue. Specifically it seems to be blank when the other two ‘repeaters’ show a Red man.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bushes on footpath to new HSL school, 11th August
item.description:
This footpath will be a route to the new High School Leckhampton starting 05/09/2022. 11 & 12 year old children walking to school. The bushes need cutting back so that the route is safer for kids when passing other walkers/large dogs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Robinswood Cottage Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown path for primary HSL school walk, 10th August
item.description:
This footpath across Lotts Meadow (connecting Burrows Frield to Kidnappers Lane) is overgrown but will be a primary walking route for 11 & 12 year old children to High School Leckhampton from 05/09/2022. The current path isn’t wide enough for children to move away from large dogs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bungalow Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees overgrown on new HSL school route, 10th August
item.description:
Low overhanging/overgrown tree obstructing pathway on bridge joining Burrows Field and Lotts Meadow. The will be a primary route for 11&12 year old children for the new High School Leckhampton starting on 05/09/2022

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 109 Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter in abundance, 10th August
item.description:
Litter, shopping trolley mess everywhere up the whole street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Lloyd Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in dire need of repair and resurfacing, 10th August
item.description:
The road from junction with St Georges Road through to train station is in dire need of resurfacing and repair. It’s a nightmare to drive down as constantly have to dodge uneven surfaces and multiple pot holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 125 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: COVID hoax sticker, 9th August
item.description:
Please remove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Dunalley Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Boulton Road poor road surface, 9th August
item.description:
2 large areas of very poor road surface outside numbers 5 and 7 Boulton Road needs fixing please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 599 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin not emptied, 9th August
item.description:
This bin used to be emptied on a Monday but it seems to have been missed for weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Manor Court, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation obscuring pavement & Road Sign - Greenacre Way, 7th August
item.description:
Vegetation by balancing pond at entrance to Greenacre Way (bypass end) now covering pavement to extent that is impossible to use pavement & pedestrians now have to step into the road to pass, plus roadsign obscured at entrance to road. This vegetation hasn’t been cut back for at least 3 years now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Greenacre Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin, 7th August
item.description:
It needs emptying in Barberwood car park. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ullenwood Park Farm A436, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water valve access point, 6th August
item.description:
The area around this has been re tarmaced but the flap now doesn’t lay flat as the tarmac has encroached in to the edge of the hole too much. It causes quite a bad trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 71 Christ Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadworks sign & sandbags, 5th August
item.description:
Outside no. 8 Glencairn Park Road is a large roadworks warning sign. Been there for weeks, with no roadworks in the road. ALSO 2 sandbags at base of tree on opposite pavement - been there for months. All needs clearing away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, road sign, freezer, bin been dumped, 5th August
item.description:
The pile of dumped stuff seems to have been growing over the last few months, now completely blocking pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Stearman Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road surface by entrance to recycling centre, 4th August
item.description:
The road surface is very poor where the main road joins the entrance to the recycling centre. A cyclist was serious hurt recently due to this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Station House Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard in road is flashing, should be a steady light, 4th August
item.description:
On the A40 Golden Valley approach to Elmbridge Court roundabout, a bollard numbered 6539 is flashing. I t should be lit permanently and the flashing is distracting at night time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bush on pavement, 3rd August
item.description:
Overgrown bush on pavement obscuring view and making it impossible to see oncoming traffic when turning out of Guinevere Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 41 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burnt Flytipped Matewrial at Location, 3rd August
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. This entrance now seems to be being used as a burn site - EVEN in this dry weather! The residual burnt material is by the entrance to the footpath. Please can it be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently planted tree has been snapped., 2nd August
item.description:
As above, this young tree has been snapped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 65 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
